articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The young Guardsman ignited fury 'taking the p**s' while on duty at Windsor Castle, in a video which has been viewed almost 350,000 times on social media.
articles.content: A soldier guarding the King has been blasted for bringing 'the military into disrepute' after filming a 'stupid' TikTok video of himself gyrating his crotch against his rifle while on duty at Windsor… [+5854 chars]
